banner.mainTitle: We help people gain in-demand skills and grow confidently in career and life
banner.blogTitle: Read helpful articles, tips, and the latest news

about.description: We combine online courses, practice, community, and experts to provide you not just with knowledge, but real skills and growth. Our mission is to make quality education accessible, practical, and results-driven.
about.partners: company employees trained and working in our systems
about.mentors: mentors and experts with hands-on experience

certificate.title: Certificate from Enlight
certificate.description: Confirms that you have completed the course and will be an added value when applying for a job.

0.name: Ruslan Ismailov, Uzbekistan, Tashkent
0.text: Everything is great, especially the curator's work. I liked the timely review of practical tasks and the Telegram chat group where you can ask any question and get an answer at any time.

1.name: Muhammadjon Nabiev, Uzbekistan, Fergana
1.text: Everything is clear and explained concisely. Before starting, I thought it was impossible to learn the profession, but Skillbox proved otherwise. Thank you very much!

2.name: Aliya Rakhimova, Uzbekistan, Samarkand
2.text: Very cool approach! Lots of practice, interesting tasks, and excellent mentors.

3.name: Sherzod Karimov, Uzbekistan, Andijan
3.text: The material is presented in a simple and accessible way. I learned a lot in a short time.

promo.title: Enlight Club — your space for growth.
promo.description: A program for active Enlight residents who want more: more knowledge, networking, opportunities, and hands-on experience. Participation is free and available after enrolling in any course. You’ll join a vibrant community with regular business breakfasts, masterclasses, workshops, coaching sessions, meetings with entrepreneurs, career consultations, and practical work in our innovation lab. This is more than just a club — it’s a place for experience exchange, networking, and personal growth. Here, you’ll find support, the right environment, and tools to grow confidently in your career and business.

aboutIntro.title: Inspiring Learning
aboutIntro.missionTitle: We help students, professionals, and organizations reach new heights through our educational programs.
aboutIntro.missionDesc: The Enlight Learning Center was created by FAYKHANUR Ltd to contribute to the education and economy sectors of Uzbekistan. It is part of the Enlight brand's educational ecosystem.
aboutIntro.teamDesc: Our team consists of experienced teachers, developers, and mentors who support students and professionals in achieving their goals. We view education as the key to success and provide support at every stage of the student journey.

contact.addressNote: We are ready to answer your questions and discuss possible cooperation.
contact.phoneNote: Call us for consultations and answers to your questions. We are always ready to help.
contact.emailNote: Send us a detailed message and we will get back to you shortly to discuss further cooperation.
contact.socialNote: Follow us on social media to stay up to date with news, events, and updates.
